abstract: In his mini-set, Gotye -- who has been releasing albums in Australia since 2003 -- shows that he is a sly craftsman with plenty of flair.
snippet: In his mini-set, Gotye -- who has been releasing albums in Australia since 2003 -- shows that he is a sly craftsman with plenty of flair.
lead_paragraph: A hit is a hit; a market boundary, in the digital era, is permeable.

headline.main: Gotye Fans Turn Out to Sing Along
